fullplot: A woman looks back on her family's life in Tokyo before and during WWII. A maid arrives from the countryside to work for an upper middle class family. She fits in well, but everyone's emotions are stirred up with the arrival of a student.

title: The Little House
writers: Kyèko Nakajima (based on the novel by)
